lead_paragraph: OBERTER--Melvin, of New York City, died June 23, 2016. Beloved husband of Joan. Devoted father of Neil (Eileen) and Jeffrey (deceased). Devoted stepfather of Linda (Michael) Stock, Susie (Arnie) Wilson. Loving grandfather of Rachel (Jay Garcia), Sam (Kristy), Erica (Evan), Adam (Ilana), Aaron, Elana, Jeremy. Proud great-grandfather of Zippi, Talia, Eitan, Liya, Coby. Private services. Donations may be made to: caringkindnyc.org. 1/3
